name: Stichting Maritiem Research Instituut Nederland
goal: MARIN is a hydrodynamic research institute that focuses on improving ships and shipping: zero-emission, safety, autonomy. Furthermore, we work on Blue Growth: renewable energy from the oceans, sustainable development at sea.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: We focus on setting the research agenda for Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe. Furthermore, we are involved in the development of Sustainable shipping initiatives.
